price: 39. Waxaa loo idmay kuwa lala dagaallami (inay dagaallamaan)15 waayo waa la dulmiyey, Allena wuu Karaa inuu guul siiyo.
arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ
footnotes: 15. Waxaa loola jeedaa halkan asxaabtii Nabiga s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun
